thread.title: BRIEF-Penn National Gaming Secures Illinois Gaming Board Approval Of Its Pending Acquisition Of Pinnacle Entertainment

title: BRIEF-Penn National Gaming Secures Illinois Gaming Board Approval Of Its Pending Acquisition Of Pinnacle Entertainment

organizations.name: brief-penn national gaming secures illinois gaming
board approval of its pending acquisition of pinnacle entertainment reuters

text:
April 12, 2018 / 6:19 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Penn National Gaming Secures Illinois Gaming Board Approval Of Its Pending Acquisition Of Pinnacle Entertainment Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Penn National Gaming : 
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING SECURES ILLINOIS GAMING BOARD APPROVAL OF ITS PENDING ACQUISITION OF PINNACLE ENTERTAINMENT 
* REMAIN ON TRACK TO COMPLETE TRANSACTION IN SECOND HALF OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
